snippet: Mr. Lessig, a Harvard professor focused on campaign finance, has raised over $1 million in his campaign for the Democratic nomination but has struggled to get noticed.
abstract: Harvard Prof Lawrence Lessig, mounting campaign for Democratic presidential nomination, has little to show in polls, despite raising more than $1 million in support of his bid; entire focus of Lessig's platform is overhaul of American campaign finance system.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Lessig, a Harvard professor focused on campaign finance, has raised over $1 million in his campaign for the Democratic nomination but has struggled to get noticed.

headline.print_headline: Law Professor’s Presidential Campaign Is Lacking in Momentum but Not in Focus
headline.main: Lawrence Lessig’s Presidential Bid Endures in Relative Obscurity
